Basic infantry unit of the Enlightenment Era that is stronger against its own kind. If beginning its turn next to another Grenadier, it performs a first-strike ranged attack before combat. Only Austria may built it.

The Grenadier is the gunpowder unit following the musketman, replacing the Line Infantry for Austria. If this unit begins its turn next to another Grenadier, it performs a ranged attack that can damage or kill an enemy unit before making contact. In addition, the Grenadier gains a bonus vs. other Line Infantry units.
Bonus vs. Line Infantry
+15% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength vs. Line Infantry Units.
Our people are now becoming infatuated with their mothers and are avoiding even numbered objects! We're worried the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Centralize Medical Care

Epidemics and plagues have cost our people dearly. In this new age of enlightenment and technology, we should seek to curb disease by centralizing all medical care to the capital.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Austria (Joseph II) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Constructs the Allgemeines Krankenhaus in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital

Epidemics and plagues have cost our people dearly. In this new age of enlightenment and technology, we should seek to curb disease by centralizing all medical care to the capital.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Constructs the Allgemeines Krankenhaus in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has founded a new medical center in {3_CityName}.
Allgemeins Krankenhaus
Free Hospital in the city in which it is built. +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science on each Hospital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May only be acquired by Austria through the "Centralize Medical Care" decision.

The Allgemeins Krankenhaus, German for the 'Vienna General Hospital,' is a university medical center founded by Joseph II in 1784. It was designed to meet the demands for higher quality facilities for medical professionals throughout Austria. Although it largely failed to combat the spread of epidemics and plagues, the medical center did make Vienna pre-eminent in the field of medical research.
Uniform the Chancelleries

The centre-piece to the modern state is a highly centralized, professional-elite bureaucracy. Let us strip all prerogatives and privileges that would otherwise oppose this ideal, and uniform the realm's chancelleries.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Austria (Joseph II) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the {1_Name} Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in all cities other than the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each city you own [ICON_CONNECTED] connected to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost increases with the number of cities[ENDCOLOR]

The centre-piece to the modern state is a highly centralized, professional-elite bureaucracy. Let us strip all prerogatives and privileges that would otherwise oppose this ideal, and uniform the realm's chancelleries.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for cities [ICON_CONNECTED] connected to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has stripped away the privileges of his realm so as to create a centralized bureaucracy.
A physician from the city of {1_City} has begun to examine the relationship between a person's memories and issues of emotional distress. He has called this study 'psychoanalysis.'
Death Penalty

Our brother, the Grand Duke of {1_CityState}, having read of its decriment by the jurist Cesare Beccaria, has recently abolished the use of the death penalty in all cases. He has suggested to us that we follow his example, as a sign of our commitment to the enlightenment.[NEWLINE]
The death penalty is a necessity and a justice.
Very well. Let us follow our good brother's example.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital begins celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 10 turns[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital goes into 2 turns of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {2_CityState}[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {3_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]
We have refused to follow the example of our brother of abolishing the death penalty.
We, following the example of our brother, have abolished the use of the death penalty in all cases.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has abolished the death penalty in all cases.
Amadeus Mozart

It is an unfortunate truth that we are not counted amongst the great composers of our age. However, we have been presented with the rare opportunity of employing the great Mozart as our tutor. Of course, our funds might yet be better spent elsewhere, on furthering Mozart's own work.[NEWLINE]
We are certainly eager to learn!
We would rather assist in the creation of a new opera.
We would rather keep the coin.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a permanent 10% boost to the generation of [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Musicians[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free Great Musician[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
We have hired Mozart as our tutor, and we have already begun to learn many things!
We have decided to patronage Mozart in the creation of a new opera piece.
We have decided not to become cultured.
Mozart
The Magic Flute
Isabella of Parma
